snippet: The militants say that unless Egypt releases jailed Muslim women, they will kill the Croatian man, who was kidnapped in July while working in Cairo for a French company.
abstract: Egyptian militants tied to Islamic State release video threatening to kill hostage Tomislav Salopek within 48 hours unless Egyptian government releases Muslim women prisoners; kidnapping is first in Islamic State's two-year battle with government involving a foreigner.
lead_paragraph: The militants say that unless Egypt releases jailed Muslim women, they will kill the Croatian man, who was kidnapped in July while working in Cairo for a French company.

headline.main: Egyptian Militants Tied to ISIS Threaten to Kill Croatian Hostage
headline.print_headline: ISIS Affiliate Issues Threat Over Hostage

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
